author: davidlt
body:
There are two parts (check commits individually):
1. Do not use DOS/Windows format while editing files, everything is suppose to be in UNIX format.
2. Due to recent news on OpenSSL vulnerabilities new default warnings were implemented. The package is causing a huge number of such warnings (thousands) to be generated while compiling CMSSW. Thus I had to modify / slight refactor _switch_ statement style.

Please review (as suggested by looking into individual commits) to verify that everything is fine.
title: Misc. cleanup for CondFormats/HcalObjects (UNIX format & style)
